name: Roco Wireless Headphone
desc: Headphones provide a personalized audio experience with over-ear and in-ear options. Sleek designs, noise cancellation, and Bluetooth add convenience, making them essential for music and gaming on the go.

name: Smart Digital Watch
desc: Smartwatches seamlessly blend style and functionality, providing fitness tracking, notifications, apps, and connectivity. These wearables offer a holistic approach to health and communication, enhancing daily life.

name: Bass Meets Clarity
desc: The LED backlighting on the keyboard is a fantastic feature, creating a cozy workspace or gaming environment and adding a stylish touch.
